title: Mehdiabad, Meyami
text:
Mehdiabad (Persian: مهدي آباد‎, also Romanized as Mehdīābād) is a village in Kalat-e Hay-ye Sharqi Rural District, in the Central District of Meyami County, Semnan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 233, in 54 families.


== References ==
